attributes.action:
SOS!
Save our services at Hensigham,  West Cumberland Hospital
attributes.additional_details:
If you reside in Allerdale or Copeland, and WCH would be your catchment area Hospital, please sign & make yourself known as a potential patients.
See also Facebook page
We Need West Cumberland Hospital. 
Thanks for your support.
attributes.background:
Essential services have been axed at West Cumberland Hospital. Patients are sent to an overstretched Carlisle Hospital.
We must reverse this madness before more patients suffer & die unnecessarily.
